raretoshiUser.comment: The name of the raretoshi user to use in selecting images from their collection. This value is case-sensitive
outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
dataDirectory.comment: The path to store downloaded files. A subfolder for caching IPFS resources will be created if its doesn't exist
downloadConnectTimeout.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, to allow for connecting to remote resource before cancelling
downloadMaxTimeout.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, to allow for downloading a remote resource before cancelling
overlayTextEnabled.comment: Indicates whether annotations should be labeled over the image to display the title, author, edition, and owner information
overlayTextColorBG.comment: If overlayTextEnabled is true, this is the color of the annotation text background overlay expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
overlayTextColorFG.comment: If overlayTextEnabled is true, this is the color of the annotation text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
stretchEdgeEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the edge of the image should be stretched horizontally or vertically to fill the background if the ratio of the source image differs from the generated image
stretchEdgeSpacing.comment: If stretchEdgeEnabled is true, then this is the amount of space to skip in the resized image between the source material, and edge being stretched in pixels
randomUserEnabled.comment: Indicates whether to traverse random users based upon discovery through holdings and favorites
randomUserInterval.comment: If randomUserEnabled is true, then this is the amount of time, in seconds, before switching to a random user
qrCodeEnabled.comment: Indicates whether to show a QR code to link from the image to the raretoshi website for that item
qrCodeSize.comment: If qrCodeEnabled is true, then this indicates the qr code box size for each pixel.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
userInfoInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before refreshing the user information from raretoshi
